name: Afterlife (itch) (Sydney Fonderie, jsxiong95, Vazkuz, Fooderxima, MichelleGo)
name_original: Afterlife (itch) (Sydney Fonderie, jsxiong95, Vazkuz, Fooderxima, MichelleGo)
description:
Afterlife is a short first-person shooter developed in Unity 2021 over the course of three weeks. Our objective was to create a visually-engrossing mystery narrative combined with a fun first-person shooter. We also added some puzzles to spice up gameplay.

Daniel - Level Design, Level Programming, and Level Assembly
Hank - Narrative Design, Level Design, and Level Assembly
Joseph - Level Design and Level Assembly
Michelle - Narrative Design and Level Assembly
Sydney - Gameplay Programming and Level Programming

Most of the assets in this project are from the Unity Asset Store or Sketchfab and were acquired for free. You can find all of our sources below:

3d Textures
https://3dtextures.me/

Unity Asset Store
Asset Store - Sci-Fi Old Rusty Props
Asset Store - Sci-Fi Office Pack
Asset Store - Cardboard Boxes Pack
Asset Store - Horror School Props
Asset Store - Table and Chair Sets
Asset Store - Modern Furniture Pack
Asset Store - Industrial Yard Pack
Asset Store - Clipboard

And of course a special shoutout to Dylan Rose and the rest of the team from The Lodge for the Fusebox asset.
